paper_abstract: In this article, the evidence for the existence of the letter from Thomas J. Beale to Robert Morriss, containing the decryption key to the Beale ciphers, is examined. A little-known previous claim for its possible existence is corroborated, giving greater credibility to this particular aspect of the Beale story.
paper_title: Key enclosed: Examining the evidence for the missing key letter of the beale cipher
